snippet: The independent investment bank said on Thursday that its adjusted profit rose to $81.6 million in the fourth quarter, up from $1.4 million the period a year earlier, as deal-making improved.
abstract: The independent investment bank said on Thursday that its adjusted profit rose to $81.6 million in the fourth quarter, up from $1.4 million the period a year earlier, as deal-making improved.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Lazard's Profit Surges as Deal Assignments Pick Up
